#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
       int t;
      cin>>t;
      while(t--)
      {
        int n;
        double m;
        cin>>n;
        m=360.0/(180-n);
        if(m==(int)m)
        cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
        cout<<"NO"<<endl;

      }

return 0;
}
